name: Texture Pulse Control Sequence

inputs.name: Texture1
inputs.description: To toggle the texture resource, drag the corresponding resource from the Resources Panel into the Graph Panel for connection configuration

inputs.name: Texture2
inputs.description: To toggle the texture resource, drag the corresponding resource from the Resources Panel into the Graph Panel for connection configuration

inputs.name: Texture3
inputs.description: To toggle the texture resource, drag the corresponding resource from the Resources Panel into the Graph Panel for connection configuration

inputs.name: Texture4
inputs.description: To toggle the texture resource, drag the corresponding resource from the Resources Panel into the Graph Panel for connection configuration

inputs.name: Texture5
inputs.description: To toggle the texture resource, drag the corresponding resource from the Resources Panel into the Graph Panel for connection configuration

inputs.name: Random Choice
inputs.description: Determine whether to start the sequentially from the first tile resource or to choose a random one

outputs.name: Attached to
outputs.description: The target which texture attached to

description: Each time it is triggered, the first texture is added to the material, and the second texture is added to the material when it is triggered again. Only works on ports of connected texture resources. Random start can be configured.
